pets.policy: Well-behaved dogs welcome! Please keep them on a leash and clean up after them.
pets.restrictions: No pets allowed during busy weekend nights (Fri-Sat after 22:00)

smoking.policy: Smoking is not permitted inside. Designated smoking area available in the beer garden.

age_restrictions.policy: Must be 18+ after 21:00. ID required for anyone who looks under 25.

dress_code.policy: Smart casual. No tank tops or flip-flops.
dress_code.note: We reserve the right to refuse entry based on attire

beer_garden.heating: Yes, outdoor heaters available in winter

accessibility.assistance: Staff happy to help - just ask!

reservations.policy: Walk-ins welcome! Reservations only for groups of 8+ or special events
reservations.large_groups: Please call ahead for groups larger than 8 people
reservations.private_hire: Private hire available - contact us for details
